documentation.text: @dev Acts as a proxy for updating unclaimed stablecoin balances from DLTs

devdoc.author: Jack Proudfoot
devdoc.details: Primary contract for providing Decent Loans. Handles loan applications, Decent Loan Token creation, loan payments, and distribution payments. Escrow functionality inspired by: https://github.com/axic/ethereum-tokenescrow/blob/master/tokenescrow.sol

allocateStablecoinProxy(address,uint256).details: Acts as a proxy for updating unclaimed stablecoin balances from DLTs

claimPrinciple(uint256).details: Used by the loan recipient to claim the principle of loan with ID `loanID`

createLoan(uint256,uint256).details: Create a new loan application with principle balance of `tokenAmount` and rate of `rate`

makePayment(uint256,uint256).details: Makes a payment of `amount` for loan with ID `loanID`

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

supportLoan(uint256,uint256).details: Provide `amount` tokens to the escrow for loan `loanID` in exchange for Decent Loan Tokens

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
